segments.text: The woman is focused on drying dishes, totally zoned out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That sink overflow is disgusting, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the floor and cabinet doors— what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that stool, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's instability is gross, like an accident begging to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cookies spilling out potentially, crumbs on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, probably getting her hands dirty too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole sneaky cookie theft in a flooding kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a clean garden, highlighting the interior filth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the carelessness leading to this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddles and tipped stools—it's all so avoidable and nasty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The bunched towel on the plate looks grimy now.
segments.speaker: PAR
